IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: PROVIDE ASSISTANCE TO THOSE DENIED THEIR CIVIL LIBERTIES
IRS990.MissionDesc: PROMOTE AND DEFEND CIVIL LIBERTIES PRINCIPLES.
IRS990.Desc: 1. PROVIDE LEGAL ADVOCACY AND REPRESENTATION TO INDIVIDUAL RESIDENTS AND ORGANIZATIONS THROUGHOUT THE STATE OF NEW JERSEY.2. EDUCATE THE GENERAL PUBLIC ABOUT THEIR CIVIL LIBERTIES AND CONSTITUTIONAL RIGHTS THROUGH PUBLICATIONS, SPEAKING ENGAGEMENTS, MEDIA AND WEBSITE.3. PARTICIPATE IN TARGETED OUTREACH EFFORTS TO COMMUNITIES NEEDING GUIDANCE ON CIVIL LIBERTIES ISSUES.4. PROVIDE INFORMATION ABOUT RIGHTS AND RESOURCES TO HUNDREDS OF THE REQUESTS FOR ASSISTANCE WE RECEIVE ANNUALLY.5. DEVELOP AND DISSEMINATE REPORTS AND OTHER PUBLICATIONS REGARDING CURRENT CIVIL LIBERTIES ISSUES.

BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: CROSS THE DIVIDE- THE VIRTUAL OFFICE TEC

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ORGANIZATION RECEIVED THE RIGHT TO USE THE IMAGE OF ORIGINAL ARTWORK FROM WHICH PRINTS ARE MADE. PRINTS ARE NOT CAPITALIZED AS THEY ARE HELD AND DISTRIBUTED IN FURTHERANCE OF PUBLIC SERVICE RATHER THAN FINANCIAL GAIN. PRINTS ARE PROTECTED, PRESERVED, AND KEPT UNENCUMBERED. ORGANIZATION POLICY REQUIRES THAT PRINTS NOT BE SOLD.
CERTAIN EMPLOYEES WAIVE HEALTH INSURANCE COVERAGE PROVIDED BY THE ORGANIZATION. THEY ARE COMPENSATED FOR A PORTION OF THE VALUE OF THE WAIVED HEALTH INSURANCE COVERAGE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: AN ELECTRONIC VERSION OF THE 990 IS PROVIDED TO ALL BOARD MEMBERS FOR A 7-DAY REVIEW PERIOD. THEREAFTER, THE 990 IS SIGNED BY THE BOARD PRESIDENT AND IS FILED WITH THE IRS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: COMPARABLE POSITION SALARY DATA IS USED TO DETERMINE THE SALARY OF THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR; THE FINAL SALARY LEVEL IS APPROVED BY THE BOARD AFTER REVIEW.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19

DisregardedEntityName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: AMERICAN CIVIL LIBERTIES UNION OF NJ
